# The `DbgVariableRecord` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a> of a variable value-assignment, aka a non instruction representation of the dbg.value intrinsic. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/record">Record</a> of a variable value-assignment, aka a non instruction representation of the dbg.value intrinsic.

This class inherits from <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugvalueuser">DebugValueUser</a> to allow LLVM&#39;s metadata facilities to update our references to metadata beneath our feet.

Definition at line 270 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debugprograminstruction-h">DebugProgramInstruction.h</a>.

### createUnresolvedDbgVariableRecord() {#a7ff50e2cbdb1f0db4d0b133d03eea6c2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DbgVariableRecord &#42; llvm::DbgVariableRecord::createUnresolvedDbgVariableRecord (<a href="#ae2c3391c27b9fa4f64f9ed1bdbbdea4c">LocationType</a> Type, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> &#42; Val, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42; Variable, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42; Expression, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42; AssignID, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/metadata">Metadata</a> &#42; Address, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42; AddressExpression, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42; DI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Used to create DbgVariableRecords during parsing, where some metadata references may still be unresolved.

Although for some fields a generic <code>Metadata&#42;</code> argument is accepted for forward type-references, the verifier and accessors will reject incorrect types later on. The function is used for all types of DbgVariableRecords for simplicity while parsing, but asserts if any necessary fields are empty or unused fields are not empty, i.e. if the #dbg&#95;assign fields are used for a non-dbg-assign type.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debugprograminstruction-h/#l00329">329</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/debugprograminstruction-h">DebugProgramInstruction.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/debugprograminstruction-cpp/#l00170">170</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/debugprograminstruction-cpp">DebugProgramInstruction.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> whether this kills the address component.
